SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.system.windows

Class RECT

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.system.windows.RECT
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class RECT extends Struct implements NativeResource
Defines the coordinates of the upper-left and lower-right corners of a rectangle.

Layout


 struct RECT {
     LONG left();
     LONG top();
     LONG right();
     LONG bottom();
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • RECT

      public RECT(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a RECT instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
